content:
FYI: https://apisecure.co/
Grahame and I are on a panel on FHIR security.
Take a look at the agenda, very API security focused (duh, kind of a given with that title)...

@John Moehrke I have registered as well and I would like to have some of my security team attend, particularly the panel you and Grahame are on. The RSVP workgroups and roundtables didn't indicate FHIR. Which panel should I direct them to? Thanks.
Scratch that, I found it. April 7th Blue Track. Thanks again.
There is not going to be much said about FHIR, but FHIR is based on the concepts of http RESTful API, so all of the discussions will be relevant to the foundation that FHIR is built.
